resources.string:
This application is project for class Programming mobile applications, on Faculty of Technical Sciences in Čačak. Creator of this app is Milan Jovanović, index 220/2019. Sure, here is the short description of motorcycles in a paragraph:
Motorcycles are two-wheeled vehicles powered by an engine. They are smaller and lighter than cars, making them agile and fuel-efficient. Motorcycles can be used for transportation, recreation, or racing. There are many different types of motorcycles available, each with its own unique features.
Some popular types of motorcycles include sportbikes, cruisers, touring bikes, and scooters. Sportbikes are designed for speed and performance, while cruisers are designed for comfort and style. Touring bikes are designed for long-distance travel, and scooters are designed for urban commuting.
Motorcycles can be a fun and affordable way to get around. However, they are also more dangerous than cars.

Ova aplikacija je rađena u okviru predmeta Programiranje mobilnih aplikacija, na Fakultetu tehničkih nauka u Čačku. Kreator ove aplikacije je Milan Jovanović, indeksa 220/2019.Motorcikli su dvotočkaši pogonskim motorom. Oni su manji i lakši od automobila, što ih čini okretnim i efikasnim u pogledu goriva. Motorcikli se mogu koristiti za transport, rekreaciju ili trka. Postoji mnogo različitih tipova motocikala, svaki sa svojim jedinstvenim karakteristikama.
Neki popularni tipovi motocikala su sportski bicikli, krstaši, touring bicikli i skuteri. Sportski bicikli su dizajnirani za brzinu i performanse, dok su krstaši dizajnirani za udobnost i stil. Touring bicikli su dizajnirani za putovanja na velike udaljenosti, a skuteri su dizajnirani za urbanu vožnju.
Motorcikli mogu biti zabavan i pristupačan način da se dođe do odredišta. Međutim, oni su i opasniji od automobila.
